alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 12:52PM CDT until July 08 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern DeSoto County in northwestern Mississippi... South central Shelby County in west Tennessee... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lynchburg, or over Horn Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Walls, Southwest Memphis, Lynchburg, Whitehaven, Alden, Twin Lakes, Bright, Nesbit, West Days, Capleville, Lake View, Glover, Jago and Plum Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
